title: Polio Eradication Program Faces Hard Choices as Endgame Strategy Falters
text: The "endgame" in the decadeslong campaign to eradicate polio suffered major setbacks in 2019 . From a report:
meta_description: The "endgame" in the decadeslong campaign to eradicate polio suffered major setbacks in 2019. From a report: While the effort lost ground in Afghanistan and Pakistan, which recorded 116 cases of wild polio -- four times the number in 2018 -- an especially alarming situation developed in Africa. In 1...
